name: Street Beat Saviour
description:
The Beat Cops have outlawed real beats & jams, leaving the innocent citizens Beatless!

Help Boomwalker spread good musical vibes throughout the city, by bringing the funk back to the Beatless, before the Power of Funk runs out!

Controls:
- WASD/Arrow Keys to move
- Space: Jump
- J / Left Mouse: Blast Sound
- K / Right Mouse: Travel through Speakers
- L / Middle Mouse: Funk Dance to Bring the Beatless back to life! (when near Beatless)
- Esc: Pause Game

James Doyle - @gamesplusjames on Twitter - twitch.tv/gamesplusjames - youtube.com/gamesplusjames
LumpyTouch - @lumpytouch on Twitter - twitch.tv/lumpytouch

Music by:

"District Four","Rocket Power","Who Likes To Party" & "Funky Chunk" by Kevin McLeod - http://www.incompetech.com
